hero.sidetext: I would appreciate a video conference to get to know each other and talk about your web development projects. Feel free to contact me to arrange a meeting. Thank you and see you soon!

experience.title: About me
experience.span1: Experienced full-stack web developer passionate about technology and software development. Skilled in creating responsive websites with a great user experience using popular technologies and web development tools
experience.span2: Worked on various projects, from small static pages to large web applications, always with commitment and dedication. Continuously keeps up to date with trends and technologies in order to always offer up-to-date and progressive solutions. Seeks new challenges and looks forward to innovating together and create effective solutions.
